alert.note: Alert for Natrona County, Casper BLM; South Bighorn Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 18 at 1:13PM MDT until September 19 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT MONDAY... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Monday. the Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Unseasonably Warm Temperatures...and Strong Gusty Winds will create erratic fire behavior and new fire starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zones 280 and 285. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont...Natrona. In North Central WY...Hot Springs...Johnson...Washakie. * WIND: Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 12 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the low to mid 80s; Highs will be in the mid 70s for the mountains.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Natrona County, Casper BLM; South Bighorn Mountains
